description: This PHP source file generates a webpage displaying battery status information for a hardware device. It includes external PHP files for headers, utilities, navigation, and footer, and contains embedded JavaScript to dynamically update battery metrics on the webpage. It retrieves battery data from an external source via the 'KeyExtGet' function, and uses HTML tables and JavaScript to present detailed battery parameters such as health, status, temperature, and more.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Retrieves external key-value pairs related to battery information.
